name: Little Trouble On Tribuda Island Prototype
name_original: Little Trouble On Tribuda Island Prototype
description:
Feedback: https://forms.gle/V3sXzCCJ3wecMQHk7

Little Trouble On Tribuda Island Prototype is just a slice of some of the core mechanics from the main game coming later this year.

We are using this Prototype to gain Feedback and Analytics to make the best Possible game.

Key Features:

Endless Waves 

Unique Weapon Upgrades

Buyable items

Unique Enemies
